name: Kiki
description:
A vibrant platformer with unique graphics and catchy chiptune soundtrack! Dodge treacherous traps and obstacles, overcome only by your agility and quick reflexes. Don’t miss the chance to test your abilities and become a true master of jumping! 🏃‍♀️

✨VARIOUS OBSTACLES

You will have to overcome various obstacles such as rotating saws, spikes and other traps using your agility and quick decision making skills.

✨LEVELS

Three chapters featuring THIRTY exciting levels with a unique design, each presenting a unique challenge. From easy levels for beginners to challenging levels for experienced players. Are you ready to take on the challenge and become a master of jumping?

✨ORIGINAL SOUNTRACK

A stunning chiptune soundtrack that keeps the pace of the game going and creates a unique musical atmosphere. The music can be obtained separately in high quality. To do this, you need to buy the music DLC.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2271220/Kiki_Soundtrack/
